The correct chronological order is: 
1. On-screen title: "THE SMART WEAPON AI." (Introduction)
2. Video cuts to a classroom scene with laptops and the overlaid text "BILDUNGS." (Topic shift to education and training)
3. On-screen ID appears: "NEIL JACOBSTEIN" with his roles/background. (Introduce speaker)
4. Neil Jacobstein discusses integration of AI into military systems, referencing "Top Gun." (Addressing the use of AI in warfare)
5. He asserts that turning a defensive drone into an offensive one is simple. (Explain the capabilities of AI weapons)
6. Neil Jacobstein notes that current US policy requires human intervention for kill decisions. (Mentioning ethical considerations)

Therefore, the correct order is option C: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.
